1:
My son, if you receive my words
\q and treasure up my commandments with you,
\q
2:
make your ears pay attention to wisdom
\q and incline your heart to understanding.
3:
If you cry out for understanding
\q and raise your voice for it,
\q
4:
if you seek it like you would seek silver
\q and search for understanding as you would seek hidden treasures,
\q
5:
then you will understand the fear of Yahweh
\q and you will find the knowledge of God.
6:
For Yahweh gives wisdom,
\q from his mouth comes knowledge and understanding.
\q
7:
He stores up sound wisdom for those who please him,
\q he is a shield for those who walk in integrity,
\q
8:
he guards the paths of justice
\q and he will preserve the way of those who are faithful to him.
9:
Then you will understand righteousness, justice, and equity,
\q and every good path.
\q
10:
For wisdom will come into your heart,
\q and knowledge will be pleasant to your soul.
11:
Discretion will watch over you,
\q understanding will guard you.
\q
12:
They will rescue you from the way of evil,
\q from those who speak perverse things,
\q
13:
who abandon the right paths
\q and walk in the ways of darkness.
14:
They rejoice when they do evil
\q and delight in the perversities of evil.
\q
15:
They follow crooked paths,
\q and using deception they hide their tracks.
16:
Wisdom and discretion will save you from an adulterous woman,
\q from an immoral woman and her flattering words.
\q
17:
She forsakes the companion of her youth
\q and forgets the covenant of her God.
18:
For her house leads down to death
\q and her tracks will lead you to those in the grave.
\q
19:
All who go in to her will not return again
\q and they will not find the paths of life.
20:
So you will walk in the way of good people
\q and follow the paths of righteous people.
\q
21:
For those doing right will make a home in the land,
\q and those with integrity will remain in it.
\q
22:
But the wicked will be cut off from the land,
\q and the faithless will be cut off from it.
